text: Psychology researcher wants to learn new language
I'm currently considering R, MATLAB, or Python, but I'm open to other options.
Could you help me pick the best language for my needs?
Here are the criteria I have in mind (not in order):
Looking forward to your comments and suggestions.
Thank you all for your kind and informative replies.
It's still a tough choice because of so many strong arguments for each language.
Python will be the least backbreaking and most useful in the short term.
R is well suited to my current work.
MATLAB is well suited to my prospective work.
It's a tough call, but I think I am now equipped to make a more well-informed decision about where to go next.
